items.title: German corporate insolvencies hit decade-high in 2025
items.summary: BERLIN, Dec. 8 (Xinhua) -- German corporate insolvencies rose to their highest level in more than a decade in 2025, underscoring mounting pressure on businesses amid a prolonged economic downturn and domestic policy uncertainty, a report said on Monday. Read full story

items.title: Kyrgyzstan's 2025 consolidated budget to exceed 12 bln USD
items.summary: BISHKEK, Dec. 8 (Xinhua) -- Kyrgyzstan's consolidated budget for 2025 is expected to exceed 1.1 trillion soms (around 12.58 billion U.S. dollars), surpassing the trillion-som mark for the first time in the country's history, Chairman of the Cabinet of Ministers Adylbek Kasymaliev said Monday. Of course, across all your options from this brand, my personal pick for holiday scores is the XP4 Folding Utility e-bike with $227 in FREE gear at $999 shipped or the XP4 750 Folding Utility e-bikes with $514 in FREE gear at $1,299 shipped. Without the usual discounts on the bundles themselves, you’d be paying $1,226 and $1,813 for these packages at full price, with the standard models seeing a shrunk-down bundle that still beats the usual $79 package we’ve mostly seen over 2025, and the 750 model continuing over its previous bundle size which has been the largest we’ve seen since it released in early summer.
